page.title: 07AFTER SCHOOL ACTIVITIES.
page.content: When I get home from school I get changed and normally watch television. Sometimes I have a few games of badminton with my mum, or go into the front garden when the car is not there, and with a tennis racket I hit a tennis ball against our garage doors. After dinner I read a book or ride my bike round the block a few times. Other times I would play board games or just mess about in the back garden. Most of the time whilst I am at home I have arguments with my brother James. We start dinner at 6 pm and finish at 6.35 pm. After dinner I normally have another two hours in the summer, and I use them playing a silly fun game of football with my brother. In winter after dinner I usually go up to my bedroom and read a book until it is time for bed.
